PageTitle: vc-type ldp (VPLS PW ping test instance)
FuncDef:
The vc-type ldp command specifies a VC protocol for NQA VPLS PW ping test.
The undo vc-type ldp command restores the default VC protocol.
The default VC protocol type is LDP.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure a VC protocol, run the vc-type ldp command. This protocol is the same as the PW protocol.
